section.title: The map_components element information item
section.para: map_component element information items (referred to in this specification as map_components elements) are element information items in the CellML 1.1 namespace with local name equal to map_components, and which appear as a child of a connection element.

listitem.para: The component_1 attribute. The value of the component_1 attribute MUST be a valid CellML Identifier. The value of this attribute MUST be equal to the name attribute on a component or import component element in the CellML Infoset.

The component_2 attribute. The value of the component_2 attribute MUST be a valid CellML Identifier. The value of this attribute MUST be equal to the name attribute on a component or import component element in the CellML Infoset. It MUST NOT be equal to the value of the component_1 attribute.
